channel.title: Making a simple barrow fighter
channel.description:
Well I need to make an affordable barrows fighter. [Barrows fighter - an account that can beat a barrows run]
I was thinking of these stats
1strength 1attack 25/30defence[For mystic robes/dosen't take anytime at all] 43/52(60-70 LATER ON)prayer[For protection ofcourse] 62mage[Airwave to kill the npc]
I am guessing it will take me about 800k for 62mage 500-600k for the prayer [Mystic staff method for mage]
So I'm trying not to waist more than 1.5-1.8mil on this account and only about 2 weeks to make it.
And I only want to waist around 200k in items before the first good loot [Not including blasts[w/ blasts 500k]]
If anyone has any better ideas please post

item.title: Making a simple barrow fighter
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:13, topic:254816”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=336699.msg2619605#msg2619605 date=1231283776]
There is a trick that you can use to get any of the melee brothers stuck on one of the rocks in the barrows, but I don’t recommend it. It’s supposed to be very hard to do. On top of that, barrows just aren’t the same anymore. You have to be able to do trips really cheap to get your money’s worth out of it, so your plan doesn’t seem economically smart at all. But otherwise, yeah, you should be able to do it fine, though you are going to get torn apart in the catacombs.
[/quote]
Well, im gunna raise my def at 50 now, and when i go into the catacombs ill just wear full rune. But, every time there is at least 50k + drop in ruins or $ or other items, 50k per trip is enough to keep me going, even though it’s more likely to be around 100k in runes, usually minds[300 avrg.] chaoses [150+ avrg.] and deaths [50+ avrg.][/quote]

I usually burn through around 50-80 slayer darts when I go there, but that’s with 77 magic. Slayer dart is the bomb tbh, but only if you can take the hits from the brothers.

Read full topic

@pk4pk wrote:

Taharok:

There is a trick that you can use to get any of the melee brothers stuck on one of the rocks in the barrows, but I don’t recommend it. It’s supposed to be very hard to do. On top of that, barrows just aren’t the same anymore. You have to be able to do trips really cheap to get your money’s worth out of it, so your plan doesn’t seem economically smart at all. But otherwise, yeah, you should be able to do it fine, though you are going to get torn apart in the catacombs.

Well, im gunna raise my def at 50 now, and when i go into the catacombs ill just wear full rune. But, every time there is at least 50k + drop in ruins or $ or other items, 50k per trip is enough to keep me going, even though it’s more likely to be around 100k in runes, usually minds[300 avrg.] chaoses [150+ avrg.] and deaths [50+ avrg.]

There is a trick that you can use to get any of the melee brothers stuck on one of the rocks in the barrows, but I don’t recommend it. It’s supposed to be very hard to do. On top of that, barrows just aren’t the same anymore. You have to be able to do trips really cheap to get your money’s worth out of it, so your plan doesn’t seem economically smart at all. But otherwise, yeah, you should be able to do it fine, though you are going to get torn apart in the catacombs.

item.title: Making a simple barrow fighter
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:10, topic:254816”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=336699.msg2617567#msg2617567 date=1231130611]

I did it on a level 52 pure once with just 11 prayer. It was easy and I got an ahrim’s piece on my first even run. You’ll be fine with just 20 def(for mystic), 43 prayer, and some mage. Just bring prayer potions.

Yeah what happens when dharack one hits you?

He could be using ancients? Or bind/snare/tangle…
[/quote]At the time, it was ice bursts, actually. You just have to be good.

You know, it’s so hard to fight an npc when it can’t get anywhere near you, and you are still doing damage[/quote]They still move, and quite often too. Nice try though.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a simple barrow fighter
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Yeah, i’m thinking 2pots (4) a run, and I estimate 10 runs before my first good loot so 20 P pots (4) = around 150k in pots im guessing, then 100k on runes. I might raise the defence to 50. But i’m thinking to keep it 20-25 as i want a low cb for pking, i just need the barrowing for some income

Read full topic

item.title: Making a simple barrow fighter
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks
item.description:
@Baros_Rocks wrote:

I’ve completed barrows on a level 42, although the barrows trips were not very economical. You’d have no troubles doing barrows with that account, although the profits you’d gain would be a lot smaller

You should try consider getting a higher defence, so that you wont use as much food up in the tunnels, also you might want to train range to defeat Ahrim easier.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a simple barrow fighter
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

I would raise the defence a bit otherwise you’ll get pwned.

Read full topic
